article.Heading: GST Sentimeter: Major GST rate overhaul
article.Summary: In in an interview to CNBC-TV18's Shereen Bhan spoke a host of tax experts and political figures to gauge the sentiment on the GST.
article.Body:
In in an interview to CNBC-TV18's Shereen Bhan spoke a host of tax experts and political figures to gauge the sentiment on the GST.

Watch video for more...
